Events that occurred on 11 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1943 - Michael George Tolkien, grandson of J.R.R. Tolkien, is born.
1963 - Voice actor Jason Connery is born.
1966 - Voice actor Robert Farquharson dies.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 293b.
1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 309a.
1992 - In celebration of J.R.R. Tolkien's hundredth birthday, the "International Tolkien Symposium" is held in Aachen, Germany.
1995 - Voice actor Peter Pratt dies.
1999 - Novelist and poet Naomi Mitchison, letter receiver of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring camps at the foot of the Redhorn Pass, and that night unsuccessfully tries to cross.
